title: Add Privacy, Terms, and Support pages

requirements.text: Create a Privacy Policy page accessible at /privacy route that displays privacy policy content in a clean, readable format consistent with the construction-themed design using the existing orange/charcoal/safety yellow color palette
acceptanceCriteria: Privacy page is accessible at /privacy route
Page uses consistent AppLayout header and footer
Content is readable with high-contrast text for outdoor visibility
Page follows the construction-themed design system

requirements.text: Create a Terms of Service page accessible at /terms route that displays terms of service content in a clean, readable format consistent with the construction-themed design using the existing orange/charcoal/safety yellow color palette
acceptanceCriteria: Terms page is accessible at /terms route
Page uses consistent AppLayout header and footer
Content is readable with high-contrast text for outdoor visibility
Page follows the construction-themed design system

requirements.text: Create a Support page accessible at /support route that provides contact information and help resources in a clean, readable format consistent with the construction-themed design using the existing orange/charcoal/safety yellow color palette
acceptanceCriteria: Support page is accessible at /support route
Page uses consistent AppLayout header and footer
Page includes contact information and help resources
Content is readable with high-contrast text for outdoor visibility
Page follows the construction-themed design system

requirements.text: Add navigation links to Privacy, Terms, and Support pages in the footer section of the Landing page so users can access these pages before authentication
acceptanceCriteria: Footer on Landing page includes links to /privacy, /terms, and /support
Links are styled consistently with the construction-themed design
Links are easily tappable on mobile devices

constraints: Pages must be accessible to both authenticated and unauthenticated users
Must maintain consistency with existing construction-themed design system (warm oranges, charcoal grays, safety yellow)
Must follow high-contrast text standards for outdoor visibility
nonGoals: Legal content generation - placeholder text is acceptable
Integration with external support ticketing systems
